data.name: Them or Us
data.detailed_description:
Them or Us is a hardcore open-world, first person tactical survival shooter game set in a post-apocalyptic world. The events of Them or Us take place on a fictional chain of islands in the Bering Sea where Soviet and Western civilizations collide!

Key Features:

  • A 256Km2 map with a variety of beautiful landscapes featuring multiple land masses and swimmable underwater biomes (Demo will feature a 16KM^2 island).
  • Up to 100 players fighting to survive by all means necessary. Kill on sight, make friends, or kidnap strangers and feed them to the horde... Anything goes!
  • A variety of environmental threats that will test your capabilities. From erratic weather and dangerous wildlife to pitch-black nights and flesh-eating infected. Not to mention other survivors (players) & bandits (AI)!
  • Discover hidden facilities and stocks, sealed offices and underground warehouses to find useful information and items which will help to understand what is happening on the Island(s).
  • Compete with players (online) to wipe out AI bandits & military personnel in dynamic pop-up events and recover supply drops & earn rare rewards.


  • Feel your character via health and complex medical / physical characteristics, including hydration, energy, blood-loss, fractures, contusion, intoxication, exhaustion, tremors, sickness, radiation and much more.
  • Control your character completely - smooth speed and stance changes and transitions, prone and leaning with the ability to fine tune everything to get the perfect fighting position and utilize the environment around you.
  • Be aware of real-life ballistics and projectile hit physics including penetration.
  • Prepare to feel your weapon as it is in real life. Familiarize yourself with the basic concepts of weapon operating - jamming, overheating, wear-out, reloading, aiming, charging and, of course, shooting.
  • Discover the most advanced weapon modding system ever. Change EVERYTHING you want to expand your weapon’s tactical abilities and create your ideal kit for survival.
  • Interact with the environment to gain situational advantages- switch lights, breach doors, create distractions & dominate the enemy.


  • When you die, you leave everything behind with your corpse and start a new life.
  • Authentic survival mechanics, including hunting, crafting, building, health preservation, and resource management.
  • Unpredictable interactions with other players leading to limitless gameplay.
  • Utilize special equipment like NVGs, radio headsets, GPS tracking systems, ballistic vests and helmets & more.
  • The louder your scream - the faster they come. Get your trigger finger ready for the incoming horde.
  • Confront AI driven civilian bandits in random dynamic events for a shot at rare equipment and supplies.


  • Experience a large amount of non-combat activities including crafting, base building, horticulture, resource harvesting, & more!
  • Communicate and trade with NPC merchants, gain their trust to get special goods and quests.
  • Sell your loot to vendors or other players in barter fairs and auctions.
  • Build up your stash, heal your character, repair and modify weapons and vehicles, examine items, & more!

data.short_description: Them or Us is an Open-World, First Person Tactical Survival Shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world where Soviet and Western civilizations collide on a chain of fictional islands in the Bering Sea.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500k / AMD Ryzen R5 1600X
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1080 or AMD Radeon R9 390 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 120 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 7700k / AMD Ryzen R5 1600X
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon R9 390 / AMD RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 120 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

data.legal_notice: Copyright © 2022 DEAD PIXEL LABS, LLC. All Rights Reserved. THEM OR US® and DEAD PIXEL LABS® are registered trade marks of DEAD PIXEL LABS, LLC.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains strong themes of a zombie apocalypse including gun violence, trauma, gore and dismemberment (for both the dead and living) and hardships built into the survival gameplay. The theme of the game is open-world zombie horror survival and contains many stylistic cues and concepts that may not be suitable for young children. Text Logs, Audio logs/recordings that contain world building elements that depict the fall of society and chaotic/tragic themes. The game features voice actors depicting dark situations such as Death, Triage, Turning into zombies, Illegal medical experiments & drug use among other theme appropriate concepts. Online gameplay may vary!
